text: "Blinded by the Light" is the debut single by Bruce Springsteen. It is taken from his first studio album Greetings from Asbury Park, N.J. (1973). ==Manfred Mann's Earth Band version== "Blinded by the Light" released a version in 1976 by Manfred Mann's Earth Band. It was taken from their seventh studio album The Roaring Silence. It reached number 1 in both the United States and Canada, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in New Zealand and number 11 in Australia. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Folk rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Boogie rock songs
title: Blinded by the Light
